mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_POST (ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_FREE_POST.NEXTVAL, #{PostTitle}, #{PostContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT P.ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_FREE_POST FP ON P.ID = FP.ID JOIN TBL_USER U ON U.ID = USER_ID WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT ROWNUM, P.ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_SCHOOL, USER_DIVISION FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, P.ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_SCHOOL, USER_DIVISION FROM ( SELECT P.ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID , USER_NAME, USER_SCHOOL, USER_DIVISION FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_FREE_POST FP ON P.ID = FP.ID JOIN TBL_USER U ON FP.USER_ID = U.ID ORDER BY ID DESC ) P1
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pagination.endRow} AND POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) P2 WHERE P2.R >= #{pagination.startRow}

SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TBL_POST
WHERE POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT P.ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID FROM ( SELECT P.ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_FREE_POST FP ON P.ID = FP.ID JOIN TBL_USER U ON FP.USER_ID = U.ID WHERE POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY ID DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT MIN(ID) AS NEXT_SEQUENCE FROM TBL_POST WHERE ID > #{id}
SELECT MAX(ID) AS PREVIOUS_SEQUENCE FROM TBL_POST WHERE #{id} > ID
